p: The participantâ€™s HIV status was determined by a combination of the self-reported HIV status on ACASI questionnaire and HIV test result (positive, negative, indeterminate) at the site. If a participant self-reported being HIV-positive but deferred or refused an HIV test at the study visit, he was categorized as HIV-positive. If a participant self-reported being HIV-negative or unknown status but tested HIV-positive on the HIV test, he was categorized as HIV-positive for this analysis.
